lead_paragraph: For the first time in 20 years, Maryland will have a Driesell on the sideline this winter. Chuck Driesell, the son of the former Terrapins Coach Lefty Driesell, will be an assistant coach this season. Chuck Driesell played for the Terps from 1981-85 under his father.
